response.content:
Here's a recipe for a delicious chocolate cake for 8 people:

```
{
  "step1": "Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease two 8-inch round cake pans and line bottoms with parchment paper. Prepare pans for even cake release.",
  "step2": "Mix 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1 teaspoon salt in a large bowl. Combine dry ingredients.",
  "step3": "In another bowl, whisk 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 cup whole milk, and 2 large eggs. Add 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. Combine wet ingredients.",
  "step4": "Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until combined. Add 1/2 cup vegetable oil and mix until smooth. Ensure even batter consistency.",
  "step5": "Divide batter evenly between prepared pans. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Check for doneness and rotate pans.",
  "step6": "Let cakes cool in pans for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Frost and decorate as desired. Serve and enjoy your chocolate cake!"
}
```
